-- 1:1문의 전체 목록 SELECT S.SUPPORT_ID, S.SUPPORT_DATE, S.SUPPORT_CATEGORY, S.MEM_ID, -- SUPPORT 테이블의 MEM_ID만 사용 S.SUPPORT_SUBJECT, S.SUPPORT_CONTENT, S.SUPPORT_FILE AS SUPPORT_FILE1, S.REPLY_DATE,
S.REPLY_CONTENT FROM SUPPORT S JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEM_ID = S.MEM_ID WHERE S.MEM_ID = #{MEM_ID} ORDER BY S.SUPPORT_ID DESC;
